Introduction

Lee Tae Vin is a South Korean singer, rapper, and actor. He first debuted as a member of the boy group MYTEEN in July 2017, under MUSICWORKS Company.

In December 2018, it was announced that Taevin would leave the group to focus on acting. Since then, he appeared in dramas such as Rich Man (2018) and on the three seasons of PENTHOUSE: War in Life (2020-2021).
